baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，欲乞輕衣，極至價直兩張半[疊*毛]。過者，尼薩耆波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: Lahupāvuraṇaṁ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyakaṁsaparamaṁ cetāpetabbaṁ. Tato ce uttari cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 12

translations.text: Eine Nonne aber, die einen leichten Umhang im Tausch erhält, darf (nur) einen, der höchstens 2 1/2 Kaṁsa wert ist, im Tausch erhalten. Wenn sie mehr als dies im Tausch erhält, muß sie es aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
When a bhikkhuni is asking for a light cloth, one worth two and a half bronzes at most may be asked for. If she asks for more than that, it is to be forfeited and confessed.

Ketika seorang Bhikkhuni meminta sebuah jubah tipis, itu harus senilai paling mahal dua setengah perunggu (10 Kahāpaṇa) yang dapat ia minta. Jika dia meminta lebih dari itu, itu harus di sita dan di akui.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼乞輕衣。應取價直二大錢半者。若受貴價衣。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 24

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。乞輕衣。應乞二錢半直衣。過是乞。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼持貴價輕衣者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 33

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼過兩羯利沙槃半。市細輕衣者。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 20
